mapper.select: select r.no no, r.aptNo aptNo, r.authorNo authorNo, r.content content, r.createdAt createdAt, r.modifiedAt modifiedAt, u.email authorEmail, u.name authorName from HouseReview r, user u where r.authorNo = u.no and r.aptNo = #{aptNo} order by no desc limit #{start}, #{sizePerPage}

select r.no no, r.aptNo aptNo, r.authorNo authorNo, r.content content, r.createdAt createdAt, r.modifiedAt modifiedAt, u.email authorEmail, u.name authorName from HouseReview r, user u where r.authorNo = u.no and r.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into HouseReview (aptNo, authorNo, content, createdAt) values (#{aptNo}, #{authorNo}, #{content}, now())
insert into HouseReviewLikes (reviewNo, userNo, createdAt) values (#{reviewNo}, #{userNo}, now())
